chara.textHome: My name is Fate Testarossa Harlaown.

I work as a mage for the
Time Space Administration Bureau.
It's a pleasure to meet you!

Bardiche can take new forms now,
a sword or a javelin.
I use both, depending on the situation.

Now I should be able to rise to meet
any occasion.

I will endeavor to make the best use possible
of my speed and incisiveness.
Let us grow stronger together.

We'll create a tomorrow where we can
look each other in the eye, and smile.

Thank you...
Bardiche and I have been infused
with a new strength.

I have met many people, and many
of those people have helped me.

Bardiche and I will hone our skills
so that we can do the same in return!

There are those who are so driven by their
loved ones that they lash out...

lose sight of their surroundings
and hurt those around them.

I want to become stronger so
I can help people in those situations.
That's what power is for.
You're back again today, huh.
Let's make it count.
Good morning.
Everything okay? Are you still sleepy?
Almost time for lunch.
Would you like to eat with me?
Lovely to meet you.

I am Fate Testarossa Harlaown,
a part-time mage for the
Time-Space Administration Bureau.

We should combine our strength
so we can do our best together!

I often practice magic with
Nanoha around this time.

There are nights we get so absorbed
in our battles that we almost end up
late for dinner...
It's kind of embarrassing.
Zzz...ZzZ... Mn... Ah?

Did you want something?
Sorry, I dozed off for a moment.
Staying up late isn't easy for me.

Sitting down to enjoy a conversation
like this... It's nice.

Oh, of course, I love having a wild time
as much as the next girl, too. I'm serious!
Bardiche and I are fully prepared.

Give me a call when you're
ready to head out.

Sparring matches identify where you've
improved and what still needs work.
Spar with me when you have the chance.
Hm? What is it?
If you're not too busy, I'd love to talk a little.

My Barrier Jacket is specialized for
close-range combat.
It's light and doesn't impede my movements.

On the other hand,
the thin armor could be a weakness.
I use Midchildan magic.
It's pretty popular where we come from.

I happen to have
Lightning Mana Conversion Affinity.
*Giggle*
I had a surprising growth spurt recently.

What do they call it againâ€¦?
Growing pains? Well, I hurt all over.
I've got to take better care of myself...

Nanoha and Hayate,
I don't know what I'd do without them.

We go to school together
and all help out at the TSAB.
Somehow, we're always with each other.
This is my Device, Bardiche.

He's an irreplaceable gift from
the one who raised me.

We've been together since I was very young,
and I'm sure we always will be.

One person can never replace another,
yet it's possible to hold their memories close.
I want the strength to do that.

I've met many types of people,
and learned what drives them.
All those experiences made me who I am.

That's why I'll never let up!
I won't lose!
Um, well, you see...

I used to have a bit of trouble
washing my hair when I was younger.
Opening my eyes was just too...
Oh, of course I can now!

Come on then, Bardiche.
â€•Yes, sir.
Successfully neutralized the target. Phew...
Good work. Let's keep it up.
We won! Is everyone all right?

Thank you, everyone.
This is all thanks to you.

I appear to have reaped
the rewards of my training.

Now I should be able to be
of use to everyone.
I'd love the chance to talk more with you.
Where do I excel?

Probably my strongest skill is how
I make use of my speed to help others...
I think?
